scripts.dev: cross-env DEBUG=true pipenv run python manage.py runserver
scripts.judge: cross-env C_FORCE_ROOT=true NODE_NAME=local_dev pipenv run celery -A CaCatHead.core worker -l INFO
scripts.worker: cross-env C_FORCE_ROOT=true CONTEST_WORKER=test_refresh pipenv run celery -A CaCatHead.core worker -Q test_refresh -l INFO
